answers.deliveryRate: 94.3% on-time delivery rate in Q3, up 5.7% from previous quarter.

answers.defectRates: Facility #3 has the highest defect rate at 2.7%, which is 0.9% above average.
answers.safetyIncidents: 3 minor incidents reported in September, all in Zone B. 0 major incidents this quarter.
